TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MouseWheelEventArgs extends System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs

summary.span: 提供各種事件的資料，報告滑鼠裝置之滑鼠滾輪差異值的變更。

span.span: Provides data for various events that report changes to the mouse wheel delta value of a mouse device.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 搭配下列事件： is used with the following events: - - - （附加的事件） (attached event) - - - （附加的事件） (attached event) 屬性是正數，如果滑鼠滾輪往上移或向前 （遠離使用者） 或負數，如果向下移動滑鼠滾輪，或向後 （朝向使用者）。The property is positive if the mouse wheel is moved upward or forward (away from the user) or negative if the mouse wheel is moved downward or backward (toward the user). 即使是針對小型滑鼠滾輪的移動會引發這個事件。This event is raised even for small mouse wheel movements. 某些情況下，它是適合實作節流藉由檢查差異是否超過特定臨界值的小型的滑鼠滾輪差異的處理常式。For some scenarios, it is appropriate to implement handlers that throttle small mouse wheel deltas by checking whether the delta exceeds a certain threshold. 否則，您可能會叫用的很小，不會更新任何的 UI 繫結至滑鼠滾輪的移動滑鼠滾輪差異的情況下的處理常式。Otherwise, you might invoke your handler for cases where the mouse wheel delta was so small that any UI that is tied to the mouse wheel movement would not update. 完全如何您的處理常式中實作的臨界值的行為，和該臨界值應該是什麼是完全實作而定。Exactly how you implement the threshold behavior in a handler and what that threshold should be is entirely implementation-specific. ## Examples 下列範例會移動如果滑鼠滾輪是正數，並將移if 下滑鼠滾輪為負數。The following example moves a up if the mouse wheel is positive and moves the down if the mouse wheel is negative. 附加至。The is attached to a . [!code-csharp[mousesnippetsample#MouseWheelDelta](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#mousewheeldelta)] [!code-vb[mousesnippetsample#MouseWheelDelta](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/MouseSnippetSample/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#mousewheeldelta)]

summary.span: 取得值，這個值會指出滑鼠滾輪的變更量。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates the amount that the mouse wheel has changed.
The amount the wheel has changed.

value.span: 這個值在滑鼠滾輪向上旋轉 (遠離使用者) 時為正值，在滑鼠滾輪向下旋轉 (朝向使用者) 時則為負值。

span.span: This value is positive if the mouse wheel is rotated in an upward direction (away from the user) or negative if the mouse wheel is rotated in a downward direction (toward the user).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有效的上限和下限範圍，這個值可能來自裝置實作或其他呼叫端引發事件，並因此未定義。The effective upper and lower ranges of this value potentially come from device implementations or other callers that raised the event, and are therefore not defined. ## Examples 下列範例會移動如果滑鼠滾輪是正數，並將移if 下滑鼠滾輪為負數。The following example moves a up if the mouse wheel is positive and moves the down if the mouse wheel is negative. 附加至。The is attached to a . summary.span: 以型別專屬的方式叫用事件處理常式，這樣做能夠提升事件系統的效率。

span.span: Invokes event handlers in a type-specific way, which can increase event system efficiency.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會轉換為泛型處理常式然後再叫用。This implementation casts the generic handler as a and then invokes it. 如需這個實作模式和它的原因的詳細資訊，請參閱 < 並[路由事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For details on this implementation pattern and the reasons for it, see and [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).
